Python package for generation of protein sequences and evolutionary
alignments via discrete diffusion models

description:
The BLOcks SUbstitution Matrices (BLOSUM) are used to score alignments
between protein sequences and are therefore mainly used in
bioinformatics.
name: py-blosum
